mapper.sql: SELECT prdt_id, prdt_genre, prdt_name, prdt_opendate, prdt_enddate, prdt_goal, prdt_currenttotal FROM tb_product;
mapper.select: select prdt_genre, prdt_name, (prdt_currenttotal/prdt_goal)*100 as "prdt_percent", prdt_currenttotal, (prdt_enddate-prdt_opendate) as "prdt_dday", row_number() over(order by (prdt_currenttotal/prdt_goal)*100 desc) from tb_product limit 3

select prdt_genre, prdt_name, (prdt_currenttotal/prdt_goal)*100 as "prdt_percent", prdt_currenttotal, (prdt_enddate-prdt_opendate) as "prdt_dday", prdt_opendate, row_number() over(order by prdt_opendate desc, prdt_id desc) from tb_product where prdt_opendate <= current_date order by prdt_opendate desc limit 3
